user.title: Tado CE Setup
user.description:
This integration reads Tado data from JSON files.

Before adding, run this command in SSH:
```
python3 /config/custom_components/tado_ce/tado_api.py auth
```

Click Submit to continue.

init.title: Tado CE Options
init.description:
Configure Tado CE integration settings

**API Optimization**
Control which API calls are made to reduce quota usage.

**Polling Configuration**
Customize when and how often data is synced.

**Hot Water Settings**
Configure hot water heater behavior.

data.test_mode_enabled: Enable Test Mode (100 API call limit)

data_description.weather_enabled: Disable to save 1 API call per sync
data_description.mobile_devices_enabled: Disable to save 1 API call per full sync (disables device tracker)
data_description.test_mode_enabled: Simulate post-grace period with 100 call limit
data_description.api_history_retention_days: Days to keep API call history (default: 14)
data_description.custom_day_interval: Override smart polling for day (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.custom_night_interval: Override smart polling for night (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.hot_water_timer_duration: Default duration for HEAT mode (5-1440 minutes, default: 60)

error.interval_out_of_range: Polling interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes
